name: The Village of the Silver Spurflowers
name_original: The Village of the Silver Spurflowers
description:
The Village of the Silver Spurflowers is a visual novel where you are transported to a fictional village where you will meet an interesting cast of characters and choose which ones you may want to date, and the best part, you don’t have to choose only one. So embark on this wonderful adventure where you can date as many people as time permits you. 

In other words, be gay, do crime, be polyam and remember to have fun.

Lydia - Aspiring Radio Show Host, played track and field in the past and still does morning jogs, has her own radio show. 

 

Darren – Runs a Bakery, soft spot for the people he loves and baking, kind of grumpy sometimes but usually in a sarcastic way while with his lovers.  

 

Dax - Firefighter, the type to save cats from trees, goes to the gym regularly to stay in shape for her job. 

 

Emma - Travel Agent, always points out the places where her loved ones work to new tourists, travels a lot.  

Midnight – Astronomer, struggles to feel comfortable making new friends, likes to sit outside and watch the stars while thinking.  

 

El – Librarian, flirty and confident with new people but shy with affection from their partners, prefers a movie night in rather than a loud party.  

 

Skylar – Currently gathering inspiration for future work, wears hoodies and takes a while to trust someone, the type to hang out in the rain and muse about their problems.   

Credit to https://so0ti3.itch.io/ for the character art except El, Lydia and Skylar which were done by me!
